translations: （弦乐器弹拨时所发出的）当的一声（tum 的复数）

phrs.translation: 德黑兰医疗科学大学(Tehran University Of Medical Sciences), 专业补钙咀嚼片, 碳酸钙, 塔尔社会

sentences.sentence: Whenever he is in trouble, he tums to his teacher.
sentences.translation: 每当他遇到困难时，他就向老师求助。

sentences.sentence: Most people know TUMS? As an antacid. But did you know that TUMS is a convenient calcium supplement, too?
sentences.translation: TUMS通常是作为抗酸剂被很多人了解，但是您知道TUMS同样是一个方便的钙质补充吗？

sentences.sentence: But TUMS tablets dissolve easily and travel directly to the source of heartburn — neutralizing acid on contact. so you can enjoy your food!
sentences.translation: TUMS极易溶解，并且直接作用于疼痛的源头——压制胃酸！ 所以，您尽可以继续享用您的美味！
